text: Congratulations Miss Anitha Menon is a 1992 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Thulasidas, starring Siddique and Saikumar in the lead roles. The film had musical score by K. J. Joy. ==Cast== * Siddique as Sudhir Kumar * Leena Nair as Anitha Menon * Saikumar as Prakash Menon * Mamukoya as Pathmanabhan * Sainudeen as Hamsa *Philomina as Kalyaniyamma *Suvarna Mathew as Seetha Nair *Bobby Kottarakkara as Kuttappan *Rizabawa as Franklin * Thesni Khan as Meera *Kollam Ajith as Vaasu * Mala Aravindan as Achuthan * Jagadish as SI Rajan Joseph * M. G. Soman as Shankara Menon * Kollam Thulasi as Keshavan Nair * Babu Namboothiri * M. S. Thripunithura * Suma Jayaram * Renuka ==Soundtrack== The music was composed by K. J. Joy and the lyrics were written by Gireesh Puthenchery. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%;" ! No. !! Song !! Singers !! Length (m:ss) |- | 1 || "Anthichukappittu" || Unnimenon, Natesh Shankar || |- | 2 || "Kalamozhi Kaattunarum" || M. G. Sreekumar, K. S. Chithra || |- |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1992 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films Category:Films directed by Thulasidas
title: Congratulations Miss Anitha Menon
